item.description:
PLEASE NOTE - I may be running quite late so Kristin has wonderfully taken over as far as getting there early and getting us some spots. NO guarantee that we can reserve 20 spots but she will do the best she can and I will get there ASAP!

They will have great food and drink specials, live music, (even bagpipes!) etc.  It's the best place to be on St. Patrick's Day in Wakefield!  The Red Sox Natives group will also be gathering there.
item.how_to_find_us: text me at 857-225-1248 to find our table/area
item.why: We've learned that we need to grab tables around 2pm (no joke!) in order to get into this place on St. Patty's! Anyone who isn't working that day is welcome to join me early in the day so we can camp out for the duration!
item.name: Harrington's Irish Pub for St. Patrick's Day!!
